Patient reviews

I was very impressed with Dr. Ripa’s practice. He is obviously very knowledgeable and skilled.
I would recommend his practice without any hesitation.

Food God

So happy I found this office. Super convenient. Very clean and everything’s brand new. The staff was great. No big wait. Friendly & professional.
I’m going to switch my daughter here too. Great dentist.

Food God

We can convert that unattractive smile to a beautiful one you love to show off. Whether the problem is broken or missing teeth, discolored teeth or a crooked smile, we can quickly get you started on the road to a beautiful, even and healthier smile.

Food God
